strategy: Kabal of the Bladed Lotus armies have a strategy rating of 4.
initiative: Dark Eldar Kabal, Tormentor, and Executioner formations have an initiative of 1+. All other formations have an initiative rating of 2+. Partisans receive a +1 modifier when attempting an engage action.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Kabal of the Bladed Lotus

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar players half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a webway portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Warhost
formations.units: Eight Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Shining Spears, Striking Scorpions, Swooping Hawks, Warp Spiders

formations.name: Guardian Warhost
formations.units: One Warlock unit and seven Guardian units
upgrades: Farseer, Heavy Weapons, Support Weapons, Wraithguard, Wraithlord.

sections.name: Biel-Tan Troupes
sections.description: Up to three for each Biel-Tan host taken

formations.name: Engine of Vaul Troupe
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
upgrades: Add one or two additional Engine of Vauls for 200 points each chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

sections.name: Biel-Tan Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Biel-Tan Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per Formation

items.name: Autarch
items.description: Replace one Eldar Exarch character with an Eldar Autarch character. (1 per army)

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add 0-2 Eldar Exarch character to an Eldar Aspect Warrior unit

items.name: Firestorm
items.description: Replace one Falcon with a Firestorm

items.name: Heavy Weapons
items.description: Replace up to three Eldar Guardian units with Eldar Heavy Weapon Platform units

items.name: Support Weapons
items.description: Add three Eldar Support Weapon Platform units

items.name: Farseer
items.description: Replace a Warlock unit  with a Farseer Unit

items.name: Transport
items.description: Add enough Wave Serpents to transport all the units in the formation with no transport spaces left over if at all possible after any upgrades have been added to the formation.

items.name: Vypers
items.description: Replace any number of Eldar Jetbike units with Eldar Vypers
